ShiftMenu

A singleton Class that represents the ShiftMenu.  It is used to create new shifts.

Summary
ShiftMenuA singleton Class that represents the ShiftMenu.
Functions
initializeInitializes the shift menu.
buildMenuConstruct the shift menu interface.
addSpaceAdd a new space icon to the menu.
removeSpaceRemove a space icon from the menu.
showShow the menu.
hidehide the menu.

Initializes the shift menu.

Construct the shift menu interface.

addSpace

addSpace: function(spaceName)

Add a new space icon to the menu.

Parameters

spaceNamethe name of Space as a string.

removeSpace

removeSpace: function(spaceName)

Remove a space icon from the menu.

Parameters

spaceNamea space name as a string.

show

show: function(x,
y)

Show the menu.

Parameters

xthe current x mouse location.
ythe current y mouse location.

hide

hide: function(forceHide)

hide the menu.

Parameters

forceHidea boolean to force hide the menu.
